meanings.definition: The quality or state of being tightfisted.
meanings.sent1: Her tightfistednesses made it difficult for her to share her toys with others.
meanings.sent2: His tightfistednesses were evident when he refused to contribute to the group gift.
meanings.sent3: The tightfistednesses of the squirrel became apparent when it refused to share its acorns.
meanings.sent4: The tightfistednesses of the old tree could be seen in its reluctance to drop any of its leaves.
meanings.sent5: The tightfistednesses of the miserly man were legendary in the small town.

meanings.definition: The act of being unwilling to spend money.
meanings.sent1: The tightfistednesses of the millionaire were well-known in the community.
meanings.sent2: Her tightfistednesses became a topic of discussion among her friends.
meanings.sent3: The tightfistednesses of the shopkeeper led to a decrease in customers.
meanings.sent4: The tightfistednesses of the company resulted in budget cuts for all departments.
meanings.sent5: His tightfistednesses were so extreme that he would only buy items on sale.
